title: I DON’T THINK JUSTICE WILL BE SERVED UNLESS THROUGH A COURT OF THE PEOPLE, SAYS ANOMA FONSEKA
content: January 26, 2011: Anoma Fonseka, wife of Sarath Fonseka says that she does not think justice would be meted out unless through a court of the people. Mrs. Fonseka expressed this view at a media briefing convened by the Democratic National Alliance (DNA) today….
